HAT.description: Hat switch: Is the top button on a joystick

MOUSE.description: A computer mouse, used to create the name for a mouse button binding

MOUSE_LMB.description: An acronym for the left mouse button

TEXT_AXIS_DEADZONE.description: Message shown for the axis deadzone slider.

TEXT_AXIS_SENSITIVITY.description: Message shown for the axis sensitivity slider.

TEXT_INVERT_AXIS.description: Message shown for the invert axis checkbox.

TEXT_KEY_BINDINGS.description: Section header for an axis or action's key bindings.

TEXT_KEY_NEGATIVE.description: Indicates the negative half of a key-binding pair.

TEXT_KEY_POSITIVE.description: Indicates the positive half of a key-binding pair.
